#include<iostream>
using namespace std;


int main()
{


 while(1)
 {

  long long int a , b;
  cin>> a >> b;
  if(a==0&&b==0) break;
  long long int x , y , flag , count=0;
  x = 1; y = 2;

  while(1)
  {
    if(x>b) break;
     if(y>=a) count++;
     flag = x;
      x = y;
      y = y+flag;

  }

  cout<< count-1<< endl;
  }}
